General.Description: Stratis is a native currency in the Stratis platform, which creates a separate and publicly available source for corporate use. The Stratis platform provides a one-click deployment system for custom blockchain deployments. These blockchains can be customized to suit the needs of the company, and can even be deployed to mimic the features of common blockchains such as Ethereum or Lisk, which can be individually checked or parallel.
General.Features: Stratis allows the creation of separate, separate blockchains that can be launched by third parties who can customize them according to their needs. Blockchains (sidechains) are protected on Stratis's main block. They can be accessed through customer lite and API.
General.Technology: Stratis is Blockchain's robust and flexible development platform to help businesses, financial services, and companies develop, test and deploy new applications. Stratis will act as a BAAS platform for corporations and organizations, and it will enable them to implement blockchain technology for different uses in very fast industrial environments.
